entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
